text: The 2020 New Zealand Radio Awards are the awards for excellence in the New Zealand radio industry during 2019. It will be the 43rd New Zealand Radio Awards, recognising staff, volunteers and contractors in both commercial and non-commercial broadcasting. Due to the lockdown measures in place due to the COVID-19 pandemic, there was no award ceremony. Instead, the winners were announced on 15 May on the Radio Broadcasters Association's website. ==Finalists== This is a list of nominees, with winners in bold.| ===Associated Craft Award sponsored by RCS=== {| class=wikitable width="50%" |- | valign="top" width="50%" | Harry Pali -
